q1: Who is the manager at Arsenal?
q2: Emory is the current Arsenal manager.
a2: Yes he is and he is a successful manager at that.
q3: What makes Unai Emory a successful manager?
a3: His experience and understanding of the game.
q4: Can Unai dig Arsenal out of that hole?
a4: He is capable of! If he can get those Arsenal players to buy into his system WATCH OUT!!
q5: Who should be the next manager for Arsenal?
a5: Emery will be successful there, but he needs time to build his own team after such a long time with Wenger in charge.
